greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of partitions of n where each part i is marked with a word of length i over a k-ary alphabet whose letters appear in alphabetical order; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..140, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,
b(n, i-1, k)+`if`(i>n, 0, b(n-i, i, k)*binomial(i+k-1, k-1))))
mathematica: b[n_, i_, k_] := b[n, i, k] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i < 1, 0, b[n, i - 1, k] + If[i > n, 0, b[n - i, i, k]*Binomial[i + k - 1, k - 1]]]]; A[n_, k_] := b[n, n, k]; Table[Table[A[n, d - n], {n, 0, d}], {d, 0, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 22 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 29 2015
